paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Both BRCA2 variants (rs397507606 and rs397507402) were originally identified in a study of AA women with familial and early onset cases of breast and/or ovarian cancer.

functional_data.summary: The variant is likely to result in a frameshift and truncated protein.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: Identified in a cohort of African American women with familial breast cancer.
key_quotes: Both BRCA2 variants (rs397507606 and rs397507402) were originally identified in a study of AA women with familial and early onset cases of breast and/or ovarian cancer.
